name: Of Boxes and Abyss
description:
Of Boxes and Abyss

Practice Unity game ready-to-play in browser or as your very own application if interested in suffering. WASD for movement. Go epic fullscreen for barely visible score counter.

Features: 
  1. Balls
  2. Boxes
  3. Abyss
  4. The S U N
